attributes.action: abolish the proposed I.D. card scheme as it constitutes an unwarranted violation of the privacy of the individual.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The I.D. card scheme is an unjustifiable intrusion into the lives of private citizens: it is another step towards a Big Brother state. Criminals and illegal immigrants will simply copy the new cards as they have copied everything else. The government needs to enforce and make better use of existing safeguards.  They are not competent enough to guard our safety and privacy with the information they already possess.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
